Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Creates the "metropolitan transportation infrastructure financing authority act of 2021"
Summary: Creates the "metropolitan transportation infrastructure financing authority act of 2021".
LawCode: Add Art 10-D Title 4 §§3975 - 3989, Pub Auth L; amd §601, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the tax law, in relation to enacting the metropolitan transportation infrastructure financing authority act of 2021
